grid.name: ADDRESS_MANAGE
grid.title: 标准地址管理
grid.sql: SELECT FA.CUID,/*主键CUID*/ FA.LABEL_CN,/*名称*/ FA.PROVINCE,/*1 省份*/ (SELECT T1.LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT T1 WHERE T1.CUID=FA.PROVINCE) AS N_PROVINCE,/*1 省份*/ FA.CITY, (SELECT T2.LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT T2 WHERE T2.CUID=FA.CITY) AS N_CITY,/*2 地市*/ FA.COUNTY, (SELECT T3.LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT T3 WHERE T3.CUID=FA.COUNTY) AS N_COUNTY,/*3 区县*/ FA.TOWN, (SELECT T4.LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT T4 WHERE T4.CUID=FA.TOWN) AS N_TOWN,/*4 镇乡/街道办*/ FA.COMMUNITY,/*5 社区/行政村*/ FA.ROAD,/*6 路/巷/街*/ FA.ROAD_NUMBER,/*7 门牌号码*/ FA.VILLAGES,/*8 小区/公司/单位/学校/自然村/村组*/ FA.VILLAGE_ALIAS,/*9 小区别名*/ FA.BUILDING,/*10 楼栋号*/ FA.UNIT_NO,/*11 单元*/ FA.FLOOR_NO,/*12 楼层*/ FA.ROOM_NO,/*13 房号/村内编号*/ FA.LONGITUDE,/*经度*/ FA.LATITUDE,/*纬度*/ FA.ABBREVIATION,/*地址简称*/ FA.PINYIN,/*地址拼音*/ FA.POSTCODE,/*邮政编码*/ FA.RELATED_COMMUNITY_CUID, FA.REGIONTYPE1, /*地域属性一级分类*/ FA.REGIONTYPE2, /*地域属性二级分类*/ fa.related_project_cuid, (SELECT T7.LABEL_CN FROM BUSINESS_COMMUNITY T7 WHERE T7.CUID=FA.RELATED_COMMUNITY_CUID AND ACCESS_MODE=2) AS N_RELATED_COMMUNITY_CUID FROM $ns$T_ROFH_FULL_ADDRESS FA WHERE FLAG=0 AND 1=1

grid.name: VILLAGE_MANAGE
grid.title: 业务区管理
grid.sql: SELECT LABEL_CN, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = BC.CITY) AS CITY, BC.CITY AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, ADDRESS, BUILDINGS_NUM, UNITS_NUM, HOUSEHOLDS_NUM, MAINTAIN_PERSON, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM T_ROFH_MAINTAIN_DEPT MD WHERE MD.CUID = BC.MAINTAIN_DEPT) AS MAINTAIN_DEPT, MAINTAIN_DEPT AS MAINTAIN_DEPT_CUID, WARNING_VALUE, CONTACT_NUMBER, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM T_ROFH_MAINTAIN_DEPT MD WHERE MD.CUID = BC.CONSTRUCT_DEPT) CONSTRUCT_DEPT, CONSTRUCT_DEPT AS CONSTRUCT_DEPT_CUID, decode(IS_PRIORITY, '1', '是', '2', '否') AS IS_PRIORITY, decode(IS_LIGHT_CHANGED, '1', '是', '2', '否') AS IS_LIGHT_CHANGED, decode(IS_OVERLAPP, '1', '是', '2', '否') AS IS_OVERLAPP, BUILD_TYPE, CUID, EAST_LONGITUDE, EAST_LATITUDE, WEST_LONGITUDE, WEST_LATITUDE, SOUTH_LONGITUDE, SOUTH_LATITUDE, NORTH_LONGITUDE, NORTH_LATITUDE, related_project_cuid FROM $ns$BUSINESS_COMMUNITY BC where ACCESS_MODE=2

grid.name: COVER_MANAGE
grid.title: 覆盖范围
grid.sql:
select * from ( SELECT L.CUID, L.RELATED_NE_CUID, (nvl((SELECT FTTX FROM an_onu ONU WHERE L.RELATED_NE_CUID = ONU.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT and rownum=1),2) ) AS FTTX, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM fiber_dp_gx POS WHERE L.RELATED_NE_CUID = POS.CUID UNION SELECT LABEL_CN FROM fiber_cab_gx ONU WHERE L.RELATED_NE_CUID = ONU.CUID ) AS NE_LABELCN, TP.city AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, TP.county AS RELATED_county_CUID, (select d.label_cn from district d where d.cuid=TP.city) AS RELATED_DISTRICT_label, (select d.label_cn from district d where d.cuid= TP.county) AS RELATED_county_label, (select label_cn from business_community bc where bc.cuid = TP.RELATED_COMMUNITY_CUID) AS RELATED_community_label, STANDARD_ADDR, BUSINESS_TYPE, TP.LABEL_CN AS ADDRLABELCN, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fiber_cab_gx WHERE CUID=L.RELATED_NE_CUID and device_type=1 )=1 THEN '光交接箱' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fiber_dp_gx WHERE CUID=L.RELATED_NE_CUID )=1 THEN '光分纤箱' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fiber_cab_gx WHERE CUID=L.RELATED_NE_CUID and device_type=2 )=1 then '多媒体箱' ELSE '' END dev_type, decode((select count(*) from cover_to_port where related_access_point=L.RELATED_NE_CUID and port_state=1),0, nvl(least((select nf.fiber_count-(select count(*) from t_sf_rofh_product ts,gpon_cover gc where ts.related_coverage_addr_cuid=gc.standard_addr and gc.related_ne_cuid=L.related_ne_cuid) from nm_fiber_ab_port nf where nf.fiber_dp_cuid=L.related_ne_cuid and rownum=1 ),(select count(*) from nm_fiber_ab_port nf where nf.fiber_dp_cuid=L.related_ne_cuid and nf.PORT_STATE=1 )),0), (select count(*) from cover_to_port where related_access_point=L.RELATED_NE_CUID and port_state=1 ) ) NOUSER_PTP_COUNT, decode( (select count(*) from cover_to_port where related_access_point=L.RELATED_NE_CUID and port_state=2 ) ,0, ( select count(*) from t_sf_rofh_product ts,gpon_cover gc where ts.related_coverage_addr_cuid=gc.standard_addr and gc.related_ne_cuid=L.related_ne_cuid ),
(select count(*) from cover_to_port where related_access_point=L.RELATED_NE_CUID and port_state=2 ) ) USER_PTP_COUNT, L.COVER_INFO,L.REMARK,L.REGIONTYPE1,L.REGIONTYPE2,L.related_project_cuid FROM $ns$GPON_COVER L ,(select * from t_rofh_full_address union all select * from t_attemp_t_rofh_full_address) TP where L.standard_addr=TP.cuid ) tt WHERE TT.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID LIKE '{userDistrict}%'
